title: Permanent URF?
body:
This is a message to every person, far and wide, to all reaches of the league universe.

I am asking for your support.

Every Oceania member wants URF as a permanent game mode, it is justified and proven that people want it from the lowest queue times league has ever seen.

Also, I've come to think of your "game mode description" of URF.
I quote "the future of competitive play".
Why is there not Ranked URF?

I love you Riot but until you give us these things league players are tormented every day.

replies.body:
I don't see why they don't allow custom game modes to be made in custom games, seeing as it's called "Create Custom". To be honest, ARAM and Normals (ranked, Twist Treeline, Summoner's Rift) get boring after a while. There's only so much you can do, and the more you play the less fun they are.

URF, even when it's AR, is fun regardless of how much you play. Even if they don't bring it out permanently as a game mode aside from ARAM/Normals, they should at least introduce it to Custom Mode.

yeah i like the idea a lot!! BUT urf needs to get balanced at first! at least roughly balanced! otherwise we would only see the same op champions over and over again.. i want champion diversity!! but it sohuldnt be that hard to balance it roughly with enough statistics and stuff like that
lol in the time since it came out ive played over 100 games of it whereas i play maybe 10 games a week of norms.
Urf is like a sometimes food. It is a nice treat once in a while but if you have it everyday you'll get sick and start to dislike it.
I disagree, I could never get sick of it.
there is middle ground, and no one understands, yes it is a sometimes food, but a sometimes food shouldnt be eaten about once or twice a year without you getting to choose where, or what toppings
Can't agree more, I dont play LoL anymore cause I don't enjoy normals but that gamemode made me come back towards the game.
